text:
ssl_engine_io.c line 1029

When HTTP/1.0 https proxy request (NOT HTTP/1.1 CONNECT),and SSL_connect
fail(because of invalid cert etc.), ssl_io_filter_connect returns success.
Then next phase,apache send request fail,and http staus Internal Server Error.

In this case,ssl_io_filter_connect might returns HTTP_BAD_GATEWAY.
creator: harada@mbk.nifty.com
jorton@redhat.com
text:
Thanks for the report.  Fixed as you suggest:

http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/httpd-2.0/modules/ssl/ssl_engine_io.c?r1=1.126&r2=1.127
